verses.verse: וְאִשָּׁ֣ה <S%H802><s%> woman אַחַ֣ת <S%H259><s%> a certain מִנְּשֵׁ֣י <S%H802><s%> of the wives בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the sons הַ֠נְּבִיאִים <S%H5030><s%> of the prophets צָעֲקָ֨ה <S%H6817><s%> Now there cried אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֱלִישָׁ֜ע <S%H477><s%> unto Elisha לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> saying עַבְדְּךָ֤ <S%H5650><s%> Thy servant אִישִׁי֙ <S%H376><s%> my husband מֵ֔ת <S%H4191><s%> is dead וְאַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> and you יָדַ֔עְתָּ <S%H3045><s%> and thou knowest כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> that עַבְדְּךָ֔ <S%H5650><s%> that thy servant הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become יָרֵ֖א <S%H3372><s%> feared אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וְהַ֨נֹּשֶׁ֔ה <S%H5383><s%> and the creditor בָּ֗א <S%H935><s%> is come לָקַ֜חַת <S%H3947><s%> to take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁנֵ֧י <S%H8147><s%> unto him my two יְלָדַ֛י <S%H3206><s%> sons ל֖וֹ לַעֲבָדִֽים׃ <S%H5650><s%> to be bondmen

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֵלֶ֤יהָ <S%H413><s%> about אֱלִישָׁע֙ <S%H477><s%> And Elisha מָ֣ה <S%H4100><s%> to her What אֶֽעֱשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> unto her What shall I do לָּ֔ךְ הַגִּ֣ידִי <S%H5046><s%> for thee? tell לִ֔י מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> what יֶּשׁ־ <S%H3426><s%> me what hast [לְכִי כ] (לָ֖ךְ ק) בַּבָּ֑יִת <S%H1004><s%> hath not any thing in the house וַתֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> has לְשִׁפְחָתְךָ֥ <S%H8198><s%> Thine handmaid כֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> in בַּבַּ֔יִת <S%H1004><s%> the house כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo אָס֥וּךְ <S%H610><s%> save a pot שָֽׁמֶן׃ <S%H8081><s%> of oil

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then he said לְכִ֨י <S%H1980><s%> Go שַׁאֲלִי־ <S%H7592><s%> borrow לָ֤ךְ כֵּלִים֙ <S%H3627><s%> thee vessels מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הַח֔וּץ <S%H2351><s%> abroad מֵאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all [שִׁכְנָכֵי כ] (שְׁכֵנָ֑יִךְ <S%H7934><s%> inhabitant ק) כֵּלִ֥ים <S%H3627><s%> vessels רֵקִ֖ים <S%H7386><s%> [even] empty אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תַּמְעִֽיטִי׃ <S%H4591><s%> borrow not a few

וּבָ֗את <S%H935><s%> And when thou art come in וְסָגַ֤רְתְּ <S%H5462><s%> thou shalt shut הַדֶּ֙לֶת֙ <S%H1817><s%> the door בַּעֲדֵ֣ךְ <S%H1157><s%> behind וּבְעַד־ <S%H1157><s%> behind בָּנַ֔יִךְ <S%H1121><s%> upon thee and upon thy sons וְיָצַ֕קְתְּ <S%H3332><s%> and shalt pour out עַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> out כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַכֵּלִ֖ים <S%H3627><s%> into all those vessels הָאֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these וְהַמָּלֵ֖א <S%H4392><s%> that which is full תַּסִּֽיעִי׃ <S%H5265><s%> and thou shalt set aside

וַתֵּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H1980><s%> went מֵֽאִתּ֔וֹ <S%H853><s%> וַתִּסְגֹּ֣ר <S%H5462><s%> from him and shut הַדֶּ֔לֶת <S%H1817><s%> the door בַּעֲדָ֖הּ <S%H1157><s%> upon her and upon וּבְעַ֣ד <S%H1157><s%> behind בָּנֶ֑יהָ <S%H1121><s%> her sons הֵ֛ם <S%H1992><s%> who מַגִּשִׁ֥ים <S%H5066><s%> brought אֵלֶ֖יהָ <S%H413><s%> about וְהִ֥יא <S%H1931><s%> he [מֵיצָקֶת כ] (מֹוצָֽקֶת׃ <S%H3332><s%> cast ק)

וַיְהִ֣י ׀ <S%H1961><s%> become כִּמְלֹ֣את <S%H4390><s%> were full הַכֵּלִ֗ים <S%H3627><s%> And it came to pass when the vessels וַתֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> that she said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to her בְּנָהּ֙ <S%H1121><s%> unto her son הַגִּ֨ישָׁה <S%H5066><s%> Bring אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> about עוֹד֙ <S%H5750><s%> another כֶּ֔לִי <S%H3627><s%> me yet a vessel וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said אֵלֶ֔יהָ <S%H413><s%> to her אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> There ע֖וֹד <S%H5750><s%> more כֶּ֑לִי <S%H3627><s%> unto her [There is] not a vessel וַֽיַּעֲמֹ֖ד <S%H5975><s%> stayed הַשָּֽׁמֶן׃ <S%H8081><s%> more And the oil

וַתָּבֹ֗א <S%H935><s%> Then she came וַתַּגֵּד֙ <S%H5046><s%> and told לְאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> the man הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> of God וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said לְכִי֙ <S%H1980><s%> Go מִכְרִ֣י <S%H4376><s%> sell אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשֶּׁ֔מֶן <S%H8081><s%> the oil וְשַׁלְּמִ֖י <S%H7999><s%> and pay אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> [נִשְׁיֵכִי כ] (נִשְׁיֵ֑ךְ <S%H5386><s%> debt ק) וְאַ֣תְּ <S%H859><s%> you [בְּנֵיכִי כ] (וּבָנַ֔יִךְ <S%H1121><s%> afflicted ק) תִֽחְיִ֖י <S%H2421><s%> and live בַּנּוֹתָֽר׃ <S%H3498><s%> of the rest פ

וַיְהִ֨י <S%H1961><s%> came הַיּ֜וֹם <S%H3117><s%> And it fell on a day וַיַּעֲבֹ֧ר <S%H5674><s%> passed אֱלִישָׁ֣ע <S%H477><s%> that Elisha אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to שׁוּנֵ֗ם <S%H7766><s%> to Shunem וְשָׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> where אִשָּׁ֣ה <S%H802><s%> woman גְדוֹלָ֔ה <S%H1419><s%> where [was] a great וַתַּחֲזֶק־ <S%H2388><s%> and she constrained בּ֖וֹ לֶאֱכָל־ <S%H398><s%> him to eat לָ֑חֶם <S%H3899><s%> bread וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> came מִדֵּ֣י <S%H1767><s%> And [so] it was [that] as oft עָבְר֔וֹ <S%H5674><s%> as he passed by יָסֻ֥ר <S%H5493><s%> he turned שָׁ֖מָּה <S%H8033><s%> there לֶאֱכָל־ <S%H398><s%> in thither to eat לָֽחֶם׃ <S%H3899><s%> bread

וַתֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> And she said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to her אִישָׁ֔הּ <S%H376><s%> unto her husband הִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> Behold נָ֣א <S%H4994><s%> now יָדַ֔עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> Behold now I perceive כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> of God קָד֣וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> that this [is] an holy ה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> this עֹבֵ֥ר <S%H5674><s%> which passeth עָלֵ֖ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> and תָּמִֽיד׃ <S%H8548><s%> by us continually

נַֽעֲשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> Let us make נָּ֤א <S%H4994><s%> Please עֲלִיַּת־ <S%H5944><s%> chamber קִיר֙ <S%H7023><s%> I pray thee on the wall קְטַנָּ֔ה <S%H6996><s%> a little וְנָשִׂ֨ים <S%H7760><s%> and let us set ל֥וֹ שָׁ֛ם <S%H8033><s%> there מִטָּ֥ה <S%H4296><s%> for him there a bed וְשֻׁלְחָ֖ן <S%H7979><s%> and a table וְכִסֵּ֣א <S%H3678><s%> and a stool וּמְנוֹרָ֑ה <S%H4501><s%> and a candlestick וְהָיָ֛ה <S%H1961><s%> become בְּבֹא֥וֹ <S%H935><s%> and it shall be when he cometh אֵלֵ֖ינוּ <S%H413><s%> to us יָס֥וּר <S%H5493><s%> to us that he shall turn שָֽׁמָּה׃ <S%H8033><s%> there

וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> become הַיּ֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> And it fell on a day וַיָּ֣בֹא <S%H935><s%> that he came שָׁ֑מָּה <S%H8033><s%> there וַיָּ֥סַר <S%H5493><s%> thither and he turned אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָעֲלִיָּ֖ה <S%H5944><s%> into the chamber וַיִּשְׁכַּב־ <S%H7901><s%> and lay שָֽׁמָּה׃ <S%H8033><s%> there

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> And he said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to גֵּחֲזִ֣י <S%H1522><s%> to Gehazi נַעֲר֔וֹ <S%H5288><s%> his servant קְרָ֖א <S%H7121><s%> Call לַשּׁוּנַמִּ֣ית <S%H7767><s%> this Shunammite הַזֹּ֑את <S%H2063><s%> he וַיִּקְרָא־ <S%H7121><s%> And when he had called לָ֔הּ וַֽתַּעֲמֹ֖ד <S%H5975><s%> her she stood לְפָנָֽיו׃ <S%H6440><s%> before

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said ל֗וֹ אֱמָר־ <S%H559><s%> unto him Say נָ֣א <S%H4994><s%> now אֵלֶיהָ֮ <S%H413><s%> to her הִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold חָרַ֣דְתְּ ׀ <S%H2729><s%> now unto her Behold thou hast been careful אֵלֵינוּ֮ <S%H413><s%> about אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַחֲרָדָ֣ה <S%H2731><s%> for us with all this care הַזֹּאת֒ <S%H2063><s%> likewise מֶ֚ה <S%H4100><s%> what לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <S%H6213><s%> what [is] to be done לָ֔ךְ הֲיֵ֤שׁ <S%H3426><s%> for thee? wouldest לְדַבֶּר־ <S%H1696><s%> thou be spoken לָךְ֙ אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> for to the king א֖וֹ <S%H176><s%> or אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to שַׂ֣ר <S%H8269><s%> or to the captain הַצָּבָ֑א <S%H6635><s%> appointed time וַתֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Say בְּת֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> among עַמִּ֖י <S%H5971><s%> mine own people אָנֹכִ֥י <S%H595><s%> I יֹשָֽׁבֶת׃ <S%H3427><s%> I dwell

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said וּמֶ֖ה <S%H4100><s%> What לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <S%H6213><s%> What then [is] to be done לָ֑הּ וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> answered גֵּיחֲזִ֗י <S%H1522><s%> for her? And Gehazi אֲבָ֛ל <S%H61><s%> Verily בֵּ֥ן <S%H1121><s%> she hath no child אֵֽין־ <S%H369><s%> has לָ֖הּ וְאִישָׁ֥הּ <S%H376><s%> and her husband זָקֵֽן׃ <S%H2204><s%> is old

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said קְרָא־ <S%H7121><s%> Call לָ֑הּ וַיִּקְרָא־ <S%H7121><s%> her And when he had called לָ֔הּ וַֽתַּעֲמֹ֖ד <S%H5975><s%> her she stood בַּפָּֽתַח׃ <S%H6607><s%> in the door

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said לַמּוֹעֵ֤ד <S%H4150><s%> About this season הַזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> this כָּעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> according to the time חַיָּ֔ה <S%H2416><s%> of life [אַתִּי כ] (אַ֖תְּ <S%H859><s%> you ק) חֹבֶ֣קֶת <S%H2263><s%> thou shalt embrace בֵּ֑ן <S%H1121><s%> a son וַתֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And she said אַל־ <S%H408><s%> No אֲדֹנִי֙ <S%H113><s%> Nay my lord אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> [thou] man הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> of God אַל־ <S%H408><s%> No תְּכַזֵּ֖ב <S%H3576><s%> do not lie בְּשִׁפְחָתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H8198><s%> unto thine handmaid

וַתַּ֥הַר <S%H2029><s%> conceived הָאִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H802><s%> And the woman וַתֵּ֣לֶד <S%H3205><s%> and bare בֵּ֑ן <S%H1121><s%> a son לַמּוֹעֵ֤ד <S%H4150><s%> at that season הַזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> he כָּעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> unto her according to the time חַיָּ֔ה <S%H2416><s%> of life אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after דִּבֶּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> had said אֵלֶ֖יהָ <S%H413><s%> as אֱלִישָֽׁע׃ <S%H477><s%> that Elisha

וַיִּגְדַּ֖ל <S%H1431><s%> was grown הַיָּ֑לֶד <S%H3206><s%> And when the child וַיְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> came הַיּ֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> it fell on a day וַיֵּצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> that he went out אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אָבִ֖יו <S%H1><s%> to his father אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַקֹּצְרִֽים׃ <S%H7114><s%> to the reapers

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his אָבִ֖יו <S%H1><s%> unto his father רֹאשִׁ֣י ׀ <S%H7218><s%> My head רֹאשִׁ֑י <S%H7218><s%> my head וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> And he said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his הַנַּ֔עַר <S%H5288><s%> to a lad שָׂאֵ֖הוּ <S%H5375><s%> Carry אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אִמּֽוֹ׃ <S%H517><s%> him to his mother

וַיִּשָּׂאֵ֔הוּ <S%H5375><s%> And when he had taken וַיְבִיאֵ֖הוּ <S%H935><s%> him and brought אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אִמּ֑וֹ <S%H517><s%> him to his mother וַיֵּ֧שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> he sat עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on בִּרְכֶּ֛יהָ <S%H1290><s%> on her knees עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until הַֽצָּהֳרַ֖יִם <S%H6672><s%> till noon וַיָּמֹֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> and [then] died

וַתַּ֙עַל֙ <S%H5927><s%> And she went up וַתַּשְׁכִּבֵ֔הוּ <S%H7901><s%> and laid עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on מִטַּ֖ת <S%H4296><s%> him on the bed אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> of the man הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> of God וַתִּסְגֹּ֥ר <S%H5462><s%> and shut בַּעֲד֖וֹ <S%H1157><s%> behind וַתֵּצֵֽא׃ <S%H3318><s%> [the door] upon him and went out

וַתִּקְרָא֮ <S%H7121><s%> And she called אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to her אִישָׁהּ֒ <S%H376><s%> unto her husband וַתֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said שִׁלְחָ֨ה <S%H7971><s%> Send נָ֥א <S%H4994><s%> Please לִי֙ אֶחָ֣ד <S%H259><s%> me I pray thee one מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הַנְּעָרִ֔ים <S%H5288><s%> of the young men וְאַחַ֖ת <S%H259><s%> and one הָאֲתֹנ֑וֹת <S%H860><s%> of the asses וְאָר֛וּצָה <S%H7323><s%> that I may run עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> to the man הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> of God וְאָשֽׁוּבָה׃ <S%H7725><s%> and come again

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said מַ֠דּוּעַ <S%H4069><s%> Why [אַתִּי כ] (אַ֣תְּ <S%H859><s%> you ק) [הֹלַכְתִּי כ] (הֹלֶ֤כֶת <S%H1980><s%> along ק) אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> about הַיּ֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> age לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor חֹ֖דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> new וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor שַׁבָּ֑ת <S%H7676><s%> nor sabbath וַתֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And she said שָׁלֽוֹם׃ <S%H7965><s%> [It shall be] well

וַֽתַּחֲבֹשׁ֙ <S%H2280><s%> Then she saddled הָֽאָת֔וֹן <S%H860><s%> an ass וַתֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to her נַעֲרָ֖הּ <S%H5288><s%> to her servant נְהַ֣ג <S%H5090><s%> Drive וָלֵ֑ךְ <S%H1980><s%> and go אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תַּעֲצָר־ <S%H6113><s%> slack לִ֣י לִרְכֹּ֔ב <S%H7392><s%> not [thy] riding כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo אָמַ֥רְתִּי <S%H559><s%> for me except I bid לָֽךְ׃

וַתֵּ֗לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went וַתָּב֛וֹא <S%H935><s%> and came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> unto the man הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> of God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> to mount הַכַּרְמֶ֑ל <S%H3760><s%> Carmel וַ֠יְהִי <S%H1961><s%> become כִּרְא֨וֹת <S%H7200><s%> saw her afar off אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> And it came to pass when the man הָאֱלֹהִ֤ים <S%H430><s%> of God אֹתָהּ֙ <S%H853><s%> מִנֶּ֔גֶד <S%H5048><s%> he וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> that he said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to גֵּיחֲזִ֣י <S%H1522><s%> to Gehazi נַעֲר֔וֹ <S%H5288><s%> his servant הִנֵּ֖ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold הַשּׁוּנַמִּ֥ית <S%H7767><s%> Shunammite הַלָּֽז׃ <S%H1975><s%> Behold [yonder is] that

עַתָּה֮ <S%H6258><s%> now רֽוּץ־ <S%H7323><s%> Run נָ֣א <S%H4994><s%> Please לִקְרָאתָהּ֒ <S%H7125><s%> now I pray thee to meet וֶאֱמָר־ <S%H559><s%> her and say לָ֗הּ הֲשָׁל֥וֹם <S%H7965><s%> unto her [Is it] well לָ֛ךְ הֲשָׁל֥וֹם <S%H7965><s%> with thee? [is it] well לְאִישֵׁ֖ךְ <S%H376><s%> is הֲשָׁל֣וֹם <S%H7965><s%> [It is] well לַיָּ֑לֶד <S%H3206><s%> boy וַתֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> her and say שָׁלֽוֹם׃ <S%H7965><s%> well

וַתָּבֹ֞א <S%H935><s%> And when she came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אִ֤ישׁ <S%H376><s%> to the man הָֽאֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> of God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָהָ֔ר <S%H2022><s%> to the hill וַֽתַּחֲזֵ֖ק <S%H2388><s%> she caught בְּרַגְלָ֑יו <S%H7272><s%> him by the feet וַיִּגַּ֨שׁ <S%H5066><s%> came near גֵּֽיחֲזִ֜י <S%H1522><s%> but Gehazi לְהָדְפָ֗הּ <S%H1920><s%> to thrust her away וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <S%H559><s%> said אִ֨ישׁ <S%H376><s%> And the man הָאֱלֹהִ֤ים <S%H430><s%> of God הַרְפֵּֽה־ <S%H7503><s%> Let her alone לָהּ֙ כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for נַפְשָׁ֣הּ <S%H5315><s%> for her soul מָֽרָה־ <S%H4843><s%> [is] vexed לָ֔הּ וַֽיהוָה֙ <S%H3069><s%> God הֶעְלִ֣ים <S%H5956><s%> hath hid מִמֶּ֔נִּי <S%H4480><s%> at וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not הִגִּ֖יד <S%H5046><s%> [it] from me and hath not told לִֽי׃

וַתֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then she said הֲשָׁאַ֥לְתִּי <S%H7592><s%> Did I desire בֵ֖ן <S%H1121><s%> a son מֵאֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> אֲדֹנִ֑י <S%H113><s%> master הֲלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not אָמַ֔רְתִּי <S%H559><s%> said לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not תַשְׁלֶ֖ה <S%H7952><s%> Do not deceive אֹתִֽי׃ <S%H853><s%>

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then he said לְגֵיחֲזִ֜י <S%H1522><s%> to Gehazi חֲגֹ֣ר <S%H2296><s%> Gird up מָתְנֶ֗יךָ <S%H4975><s%> thy loins וְקַ֨ח <S%H3947><s%> and take מִשְׁעַנְתִּ֣י <S%H4938><s%> my staff בְיָדְךָ֮ <S%H3027><s%> in thine hand וָלֵךְ֒ <S%H1980><s%> and go כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> if תִמְצָ֥א <S%H4672><s%> if thou meet אִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> any man לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not תְבָרְכֶ֔נּוּ <S%H1288><s%> salute וְכִֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> and if יְבָרֶכְךָ֥ <S%H1288><s%> salute אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> him not and if any לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not תַעֲנֶנּ֑וּ <S%H6030><s%> thee answer him not again וְשַׂמְתָּ֥ <S%H7760><s%> and lay מִשְׁעַנְתִּ֖י <S%H4938><s%> my staff עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> upon the face הַנָּֽעַר׃ <S%H5288><s%> of the child

וַתֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> said אֵ֣ם <S%H517><s%> And the mother הַנַּ֔עַר <S%H5288><s%> of the child חַי־ <S%H2416><s%> liveth יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> [As] the LORD וְחֵֽי־ <S%H2416><s%> liveth נַפְשְׁךָ֖ <S%H5315><s%> and [as] thy soul אִם־ <S%H518><s%> I will not אֶעֶזְבֶ֑ךָּ <S%H5800><s%> I will not leave וַיָּ֖קָם <S%H6965><s%> thee And he arose וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> along אַחֲרֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H310><s%> Then

וְגֵחֲזִ֞י <S%H1522><s%> And Gehazi עָבַ֣ר <S%H5674><s%> passed on לִפְנֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H6440><s%> before וַיָּ֤שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> them and laid אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּשְׁעֶ֙נֶת֙ <S%H4938><s%> the staff עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> upon the face הַנַּ֔עַר <S%H5288><s%> of the child וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> there ק֖וֹל <S%H6963><s%> but [there was] neither voice וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> was no קָ֑שֶׁב <S%H7182><s%> nor hearing וַיָּ֤שָׁב <S%H7725><s%> Wherefore he went again לִקְרָאתוֹ֙ <S%H7125><s%> to meet וַיַּגֶּד־ <S%H5046><s%> him and told ל֣וֹ לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> him saying לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> is not הֵקִ֖יץ <S%H6974><s%> is not awaked הַנָּֽעַר׃ <S%H5288><s%> The child

וַיָּבֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> was come אֱלִישָׁ֖ע <S%H477><s%> And when Elisha הַבָּ֑יְתָה <S%H1004><s%> into the house וְהִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> behold הַנַּ֙עַר֙ <S%H5288><s%> behold the child מֵ֔ת <S%H4191><s%> was dead מֻשְׁכָּ֖ב <S%H7901><s%> [and] laid עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on מִטָּתֽוֹ׃ <S%H4296><s%> upon his bed

וַיִּקְרָ֣א <S%H7121><s%> And he called אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about גֵּיחֲזִ֗י <S%H1522><s%> Gehazi וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> and said קְרָא֙ <S%H7121><s%> Call אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הַשֻּׁנַמִּ֣ית <S%H7767><s%> this Shunammite הַזֹּ֔את <S%H2063><s%> he וַיִּקְרָאֶ֖הָ <S%H7121><s%> So he called וַתָּב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> her And when she was come in אֵלָ֑יו <S%H413><s%> to וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> unto him he said שְׂאִ֥י <S%H5375><s%> Take up בְנֵֽךְ׃ <S%H1121><s%> thy son

וֶאֱלִישָׁ֞ע <S%H477><s%> And Elisha שָׁ֤ב <S%H7725><s%> came again הַגִּלְגָּ֙לָה֙ <S%H1537><s%> to Gilgal וְהָרָעָ֣ב <S%H7458><s%> and [there was] a dearth בָּאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land וּבְנֵי֙ <S%H1121><s%> and the sons הַנְּבִיאִ֔ים <S%H5030><s%> of the prophets יֹשְׁבִ֖ים <S%H3427><s%> [were] sitting לְפָנָ֑יו <S%H6440><s%> before וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> him and he said לְנַעֲר֗וֹ <S%H5288><s%> unto his servant שְׁפֹת֙ <S%H8239><s%> Set הַסִּ֣יר <S%H5518><s%> pot הַגְּדוֹלָ֔ה <S%H1419><s%> on the great וּבַשֵּׁ֥ל <S%H1310><s%> and seethe נָזִ֖יד <S%H5138><s%> pottage לִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> for the sons הַנְּבִיאִֽים׃ <S%H5030><s%> of the prophets

וַיֵּצֵ֨א <S%H3318><s%> went out אֶחָ֣ד <S%H259><s%> And one אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into הַשָּׂדֶה֮ <S%H7704><s%> into the field לְלַקֵּ֣ט <S%H3950><s%> to gather אֹרֹת֒ <S%H219><s%> herbs וַיִּמְצָא֙ <S%H4672><s%> and found גֶּ֣פֶן <S%H1612><s%> vine שָׂדֶ֔ה <S%H7704><s%> a wild וַיְלַקֵּ֥ט <S%H3950><s%> and gathered מִמֶּ֛נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> at פַּקֻּעֹ֥ת <S%H6498><s%> gourds שָׂדֶ֖ה <S%H7704><s%> thereof wild מְלֹ֣א <S%H4393><s%> full בִגְד֑וֹ <S%H899><s%> his lap וַיָּבֹ֗א <S%H935><s%> and came וַיְפַלַּ֛ח <S%H6398><s%> and shred אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into סִ֥יר <S%H5518><s%> [them] into the pot הַנָּזִ֖יד <S%H5138><s%> of pottage כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> did not יָדָֽעוּ׃ <S%H3045><s%> for they knew

וַיִּֽצְק֥וּ <S%H3332><s%> So they poured out לַאֲנָשִׁ֖ים <S%H376><s%> O [thou] man לֶאֱכ֑וֹל <S%H398><s%> to eat וַ֠יְהִי <S%H1961><s%> and as they כְּאָכְלָ֨ם <S%H398><s%> And it came to pass as they were eating מֵהַנָּזִ֜יד <S%H5138><s%> of the pottage וְהֵ֣מָּה <S%H1992><s%> they צָעָ֗קוּ <S%H6817><s%> that they cried out וַיֹּֽאמְרוּ֙ <S%H559><s%> and said מָ֤וֶת <S%H4194><s%> [there is] death בַּסִּיר֙ <S%H5518><s%> in the pot אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> of God וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> and they יָכְל֖וּ <S%H3201><s%> And they could לֶאֱכֹֽל׃ <S%H398><s%> not eat

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> But he said וּקְחוּ־ <S%H3947><s%> Then bring קֶ֔מַח <S%H7058><s%> meal וַיַּשְׁלֵ֖ךְ <S%H7993><s%> And he cast אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into הַסִּ֑יר <S%H5518><s%> [it] into the pot וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and he said צַ֤ק <S%H3332><s%> Pour out לָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> for the people וְיֹאכֵ֔לוּ <S%H398><s%> that they may eat וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> no הָיָ֛ה <S%H1961><s%> become דָּבָ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> act רָ֖ע <S%H7451><s%> adversity בַּסִּֽיר׃ <S%H5518><s%> in the pot ס

וְאִ֨ישׁ <S%H376><s%> a man בָּ֜א <S%H935><s%> And there came מִבַּ֣עַל שָׁלִ֗שָׁה <S%H1190><s%> from Baalshalisha וַיָּבֵא֩ <S%H935><s%> and brought לְאִ֨ישׁ <S%H376><s%> the man הָאֱלֹהִ֜ים <S%H430><s%> of God לֶ֤חֶם <S%H3899><s%> bread בִּכּוּרִים֙ <S%H1061><s%> of the firstfruits עֶשְׂרִֽים־ <S%H6242><s%> twenty לֶ֣חֶם <S%H3899><s%> loaves שְׂעֹרִ֔ים <S%H8184><s%> of barley וְכַרְמֶ֖ל <S%H3759><s%> and full ears of corn בְּצִקְלֹנ֑וֹ <S%H6861><s%> in the husk וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> thereof And he said תֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> Give לָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> unto the people וְיֹאכֵֽלוּ׃ <S%H398><s%> that they may eat
